description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis - Heal Your Back Pain With Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • How hypnosis can help you heal your back pain problem with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • Do you have a back pain problem?
  • Is your back pain severe and you have done everything to treat your back pain but it still exists?
  • Does your back pain make you depressed and lethargic?
  • Does your back pain make your everyday activities difficult?
  • Or does you back pain stop you from walking, driving, gardening, swimming or taking part in any sports activity?
  • If yes, then this is the course for you.

You will be able to reduce stress, sleep problems, depression and negative thinking using powerful affirmations which is given as a bonus along with the lecture .

This course is very useful for those are mentally and physically suffering from the affects of back pain.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their back problems

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: Heal Your Back Pain

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise : General Healing Audio File

Lecture9: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis- Heal Your Back Pain With Self Hypnosis
